template.name: Template - HP RAID Controller
template.description: Need the definition for {$CTRL_SLOT}; default value=1 Get information, about: - controller - health status; cache status; battary status - logical device(s) - health status, caching, RAID type and size (MB) - physical device(s) - health status, temperature, size - smart info for physical device - smart test (aka health); any info for attributes

item_prototype.name: HP RAID Slot $2: PD $3 Current Temperature
item_prototype.description: In hpacli defined for: Interface Type: SATA And not defined for SAS interface

item_prototype.name: HP RAID Slot $2: PD $3 Interface Type

trigger_prototype.name: HP RAID PD {#HPDISK},{#HPID} Elements in defect list on {HOSTNAME}
